title: The Blood of Youth
overview: Adapted from the novel "Shao Nian Ge Xing" (少年歌行) by Zhou Mu Nan (周木楠).Aspiring young hero Lei Wu Jie was on his way to the great Xue Yue City when he mistakenly strayed into the Fallen Snow Villa. His first heroic deed does not go as planned since he ended up owing the owner Xiao Se a debt for the damages to his place. Left with no choice, Lei Wu Jie takes Xiao Se along and on their journey, they meet Tang Lian who is a disciple of the Tang sect. Together, the group of youths embark on an adventure.
